metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7491 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the DBI module before 1.628 for Perl. Stack corruption occurs when a user-defined function requires a non-trivial amount of memory and the Perl stack gets reallocated.

notes.Note: leosilva> precise backport can be a bit trick and cause regressions. For now, ignoring it.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
